item.title: 5 Reasons Traveling With Little Kids Is Awesome
item.description:
5 Reasons Traveling With Little Kids Is Awesome

Anyone who has ever traveled with little kids understands the challenges that come with it. Â Recently my wife and I traveled to Colorado with our 3 year old and our 14 month old. Before we had kids the only challenging part of a trip was getting though airport security. The ride to the airport was a great time to talk and dream together and the flight itself was a relaxing opportunity to read a good book or listen to some music while someone served us water and peanuts 4 at a time.
